options.text: "This law would violate our religious right to wear our sacred top hats while riding motorcycles!" exclaims @@RANDOM_NAME@@, president of the Violetist Scooter Corps, as @@HE@@ points @@HIS@@ ceremonial blade at your chest. "We have worn the top hat in times of war on the battlefield! Our protection comes from Violet herself! Require the ungodly heathens to wear helmets! Those who are chosen by Violet to ride will ride in style or die trying!" [[color=blue]Violetism is legal[/color]]
options.result: biker gangs and fashionistas are converting to Violetism en masse

options.text: "This law would violate our religious right to wear our sacred top hats while riding motorcycles!" exclaims @@RANDOM_NAME@@, president of the Traqnuil Yellowist Scooter Corps, as @@HE@@ points @@HIS@@ ceremonial blade at your chest. "We have worn the top hat in times of war on the battlefield! Our protection comes from the Yellow One himself! Require the ungodly heathens to wear helmets! options.text: "The stove pipe is right, helmets are lame!" agrees Dean James, your slacker nephew. "How am I going to impress any babes if I have helmet hair?" he asks, running his hand through his hair while checking out your secretary over his sunglasses. "Do the right thing boss; helmets are for losers."
options.result: stylish juvenile delinquents are highly overrepresented in fatal motorcycle accidents

options.text: "Don't listen to him, dear," says your sister, while she drags her son towards the door by the ear. "You had the right idea: everyone riding a motorcycle should wear a helmet, and a padded full body protective suit, and a reflective vest, and neck warmers and..." she continues listing security gear as she leaves the room with your nephew in tow.
options.result: motorcycle riders are required to wear so much gear they've been nicknamed "Stay Pufts"

options.text: "It's not enough!" screams one of your junior aides, a fragile and slightly confused soul who was particularly disturbed by the recent accident. "It's not just traffic! People slip in the shower every day, cans fall on their heads in supermarkets, disoriented birds; we're all exposed, at all times! If people are too stupid to realize that, we have to make them! There should be a helmet law for everyone! Wear a helmet or go to jail!" [[color=red]Must have prisons[/color]]
options.result: hairdressers are forced to use all the tricks of the trade after citizens became required to wear helmets at all times

People slip in the shower every day, cans fall on their heads in supermarkets, disoriented birds; we're all exposed, at all times! If people are too stupid to realize that, we have to make them!
